atha khalu mahāmatir bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar api
bhagavantam etad avocat/ arhantaḥ punar bhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ
samyaksaṃbodhau/ aparinirvāṇadharkāś ca sattvās
tathāgatatve/ yasyāṃ ca rātrau tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
abhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca rātrau parinirvṛtta etasminn
antare bhagavataikam apy akṣaraṃ nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtam/ sadāsamāhitāś
ca tathāgatā na vitarkayanti na vyavacārayanti/
nirmāṇāni ca nirmāya tais tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kurvanti/ kiṃ
kāraṇaṃ vijñānānāṃ ca kṣaṇaparamparābhedalakṣaṇaṃ nirdiśyante/
vajrapāṇiś ca satatasamitaṃ nityābubaddhaḥ/ pūrvā ca
koṭir na prajñāyate/ nirvṛtiś ca prajñāpyate/ mārāś ca mārakarmāṇi
ca karmaplotayaś ca/ cañcāmāṇavikā sundarikā
pravrājikā yathā dhautapātrādīni ca bhagavan karmāvaraṇāni
dṛśyante/ tat kathaṃ bhagavatā sarvākārajñatā prāptā aprahīṇair
doṣaiḥ/ bhagavān āha/ tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu sādhu ca
suṣṭhu ca manasikuru/ bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te/ sādhu bhagavann iti
mahāmatir bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt//
bhagavāṃs tasyaitad avocat/ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ
saṃdhāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca caritavatāṃ protsāhanārthaṃ/ santi
hi mahāmate bodhisattvacaryācāriṇa ihānyeṣu ca
buddhakṣetreṣu yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānanirvāṇābhilāṣas teṣāṃ
śrāvakayānarucivyāvartanārthaṃ mahāyānagatiprotsāhanārthaṃ ca tan
nirmitaśrāvakān nirmāṇakāyair vyākaroti na ca dharmatābuddhaiḥ/
etat saṃdhāya mahāmate śrāvakavyākaraṇaṃ nirdiṣṭam/ na hi
mahāṃate śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ kleśāvaranaprahāṇaviśeṣo
vimuktyekarasatayā nātra jñeyāvaranaprahāṇam/ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ
punar mahāmate dharmanairātmyadarśanaviśeṣād viśudhyate/ kleśāvaraṇaṃ
tu pudgalanairātmyadarśanābhyāsapūrvakaṃ prahīyate/ manovijñānanivṛtteḥ/
dharmāvaraṇavinirmuktiḥ punar ālayavijñānavāsanāvinivṛtter viśudhyati/
pūrvadhamasthititāṃ saṃdhāyaāpūrvacaramasya
cābhāvāt pūrvaprahīṇair evākṣaras tathāgato na vitarkhya
na vicārya dharmaṃ deśayati/ saṃprajānakāritvād amuṣitasmṛtitvāc
ca na vitarkayati na vicārayati caturvāsanābhūmiprahīṇatvāc
cyutidvayavigamāt kleśajñeyāvaraṇadvayaprahāṇāc ca//
sapta mahāmate manomanovijñānacakṣurvijñānādayaḥ kṣaṇikā
vāsanāhetutvāt kuśalānāsravapakṣarahitā na saṃsāriṇaḥ/
tathāgatagarbhaḥ punar mahāmate saṃsarati nirvāṇasukhaduḥkhahetukaḥ/
na ca bālapṛthagjanā avabudhyante śūnyatāvikṣiptamatayaḥ/
nirmitanairmāṇikānāṃ mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ
vajrapāṇiḥ pārśvānugato na maulānāṃ tathāgatānām
arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām/ maulo hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ
sarvapramāṇendiryavinivṛttaḥ sarvabālaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatīrthyānām/
dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāriṇastam āgacchanty abhisamayadharmajñānakṣāntyā/
ato vajrapāṇis tān nānubadhnāti/ sarve hi
nirmitabuddhā na karmaprabhavā na teṣu tathāgato na cānyatra
tebhyas tathāgataḥ/ kumbhakārālambanādiprayogeneva sattvakṛtyāni
karoti lakṣaṇopetaṃ ca deśayati na tu svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ
svapratyātmāryagatigocaram/ punar aparaṃ mahāmate ṣaṇṇāṃ
vijñānakāyānāṃ nirodhād ucchedadṛṣṭim āśrayanti bālapṛthagjanā
ālayānabodhāc chāśvatadṛṣṭayo bhavanti/ svamativikapasya
mahāmate pūrvakoṭir na prajñāyate/ savamativikalpasyaiva
vinivṛtter mokṣaḥ prajñāyate/ caturvāsanāprahāṇāt
sarvadoṣaprahāṇam// tatredam ucyate//
trīṇi yānāny ayānaṃ ca buddhānāṃ nāsti nirvṛtiḥ//7-1ab//
buddhatve vyākṛtāḥ sarve vītadoṣāś ca deśitāḥ//7-1cd//
abhisamayāntikam jñānaṃ nirupādigatis tathā//7-2ab//
protsāhanāṃ ca līnānām etat saṃdhāya deśitam//7-2cd//
buddhair utpāditaṃ jñānaṃ mārgas tair eva deśitaḥ//7-3ab//
yānti tenaiva nānyena atas teṣāṃ na nirvṛtiḥ//7-3cd//
bhāvakāmārūpadṛṣṭīnāṃ vāsaṇ vai caturvidhā//7-4ab//
manovijñānasaṃbhūtā ālayaṃ ca manaḥ sthitāḥ//7-4cd//

śāśvataṃ ca anādyena nirvāṇamatidṛṣṭinām//7-8cd//
iti nairmāṇikaparivartaḥ saptamaḥ//
atha khalu mahāmatir bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantaṃ
gāthābhiḥ paripṛcchya punar apy adhyeṣate sma/ deśayatu me bhagavāṃs
tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho māṃsabhakṣaṇe gunadoṣaṃ yenāhaṃ
cānye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anāgatapratyutpannakāle
sattvānāṃ kravyādasattvagativāsanāvāsitānāṃ māṃsabhojagṛdhrāṇāṃ
rasatṛṣṇāprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayām/ yathā ca
te kravyādabhojinaḥ sattvā vinādya rasatṛṣṇāṃ dharmarasāhārakāṅkṣyā
sarvasattvaikaputrakapremānugatāḥ parasparaṃ mahāmaitrīṃ
pratilabheran/ pratilabhya sarvabodhisattvabhūmiṣu kṛtayogyāḥ
kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeran/ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyā
vā viśramyānuttarāṃ tāthāgatīṃ bhūmim upsarpayeyuḥ/
durākhyātadharmair api tāvad bhagavann anyatīrthikair lokāyātadṛṣṭyabhiniviṣṭaiḥ
sadasatpakṣocchedaśāśvatavādibhir māṃsaṃ nivāryate
bhakṣyamāṇaṃ svayaṃ ca na bhakṣate/ prāg eva kryaikarase
samyaksaṃbuddhe praṇīte lokanātha tava śāsane māṃsaṃ svayaṃ ca
bhakṣante bhakṣyamāṇaṃ ca na nivāryate/ tat sādhu bhagavān
sarvalokānukampakaḥ sarvasattvaikaputrakasamadarśī mahākāruṇiko
'nukampām upādāya māṃsabhakṣaṇe guṇadoṣān deśayatu me
yathāhaṃ cānye ca bodhisattvās tathatvāya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayema/
bhagvān āha/ tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu
ca manasikuru/ bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te/ sādhu bhagavann iti
mahāmatir bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt//
bhagavāṃs tasyaitad avocat/ aparimitair mahāmate kāraṇair māṃsaṃ
sarvam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya tebhyas tūpadeśamātram vakṣyāmi/
iha mahāmte anena dīrgheṇādhvanā saṃsaratāṃ prāṇināṃ
nāsty asau kaścit sattvah sulabharūpo yo na mātā
bhūt pitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā putro vā duhitā vā
anyatrānyataro vā svajanabandhubandhūbhūto vā tasyānyajanmaparivṛttāśrayasya
mṛgapaśupakṣiyonyantarbhūtasya bandhor bandhūbhutasya
vā sarvabhutātmabhutānūpāgantukāmena sarvajantuprāṇibhūtasaṃbhūtaṃ
māṃsaṃ katham iva bhakṣyaṃ syād buddhadharmakāmena bodhisattvena
mahāsattvena/ rākṣasasyāpi mahāmate tathāgatānām imāṃ
dharmasudharmatām upaśrutyopagatarakṣabhāvāḥ kṛpālavā bhavanti
māṃsabhakṣaṇavinivṛttāḥ kim uta dharkāmā janāḥ/ evaṃ tāvan
mahāmate teṣu teṣu jātiparivarteṣu sarvasattvāḥ svajanabandhubhāvasaṃjñā
sarvasattvaikaputrakasaṃjñābhāvānārthaṃ māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ
kṛpātmano bodhisattvasyābhakṣyaṃ māṃsam/ vyabhicārād api mahāmate
māṃsam sarvam abhakṣyaṃ cāritravato bodhisattvasya/
śvakharoṣṛrāśvabalīvardamānuṣamāṃsādīni hi mahāmate lokasyābhakṣyāṇi
māṃsāni tāni ca mahāmate vīthyantareṣv aurabhrikā
bhakṣyāṇīti kṛtvā mūlyahetor vikriyante yatas tato 'pi
mahāmate māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya//
śukraśonitasaṃbhavād api mahāmate śucikāmatām upādāya
bodhisattvasya māṃsam abhakṣyam/ udvejanakaratvād api mahāmate
bhūtānāṃ maitrīm icchato yogino māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya/
tad yathāpi mahāmate ḍombacāṇḍālakauvartādīcchapiśitāśinaḥ
sattvān dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā śvānaḥ prabhayanti
bhayen maranaprāptāś caike bhavanty asmān api mārayiṣyantīti
evam eva mahāmate 'nye 'pi khabhūjalasaṃniśritān sukṣmajantavo
ye māṃsāśino darśanād dūrād eva paṭunā ghrāṇenāghrāya
gandhaṃ rākṣasasyeva mānuṣā drutam upasarpayanti maranasaṃdehāś
caike bhavanti/ tasmād api ca mahāmate udvejanakaratvān
mahāmaitrivihāriṇo yogino māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya/
anāryajanajuṣṭaṃ durgandham akīrtikaratvād api mahāmate āryajanavivarjitatvāc
ca māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya/ ṛṣibhojanāhāro
hi mahāmate āryajano na māṃsarudhirāhāra
ity ato 'pi bodhisattvasya māṃsam abhakṣyam//
bahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpy apavāvaparihāraṃ cecchataḥ
śāsanasya mahāmate māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmano bodhisattvasya/
tad yathā mahāmate bhavanti loke śāsanāpavādavaktāraḥ kiṃcit
teṣāṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ kuto vā brāhmaṇyaṃ yan nāmaite pūrvarṣibhojanānyapāsya
kravyādā ivāmiṣāhārāḥ paripūrṇakukṣayaḥ
khabhumijalasaṃniśritān sūkṣmāṃs trāsayanto jantūn samuttrāsayanta
imaṃ lokaṃ samantatah paryaṭann iha tam eṣāṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvas tam eṣāṃ
brāhmaṇyaṃ nāsty eṣāṃ dharmo na vinaya ity anekaprakārapratihatacetasaḥ
śāsanam evāpavadanti/ tasmād bahujanacittānurakṣaṇatayāpy
apavādaparihāraṃ cecchatah śāsanasya mahāmate māmsaṃ
sarvam abhakṣyaṃ krpātmano bodhisattvasya//
mṛtaśavadurgandhapratikūlasāmānyād api mahāmate māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ
bodhisattvasya/ mṛtasyāpi hi mahāmate manuṣyasya
māṃse dahyamāne tadanyaprāṇimāṃse ca na kaścid gandhaviśeṣaḥ
samam ubhayamāṃsayor dahyamānayor daurgandhyam ato 'pi mahāmate
śucikāmasya yoginaḥ sarvaṃ māṃsam abhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya//

prāntāni śayanāsanāny adhyāvasatāṃ yogināṃ
yogācārāṇāṃ maitrīvihāriṇāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ vidyāsādhayitukāmānāṃ
vidyāsādhanamokṣavighnakaratvān mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitQṇāṃ ca sarvayogasādhanāntarāyakaram
ity api samanupaśyatāṃ mahāmate svaparātmahitakāmasya
māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ bodhisattvasya/ rūpālambana-
vijñānapratyayāsvādajanakatvād api sarvabhūtātmabhutasya kṛpātmanaḥ

avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ śraddhānām avikalpānāṃ

iti vadāmi//
bhūtapūrvaṃ mahāmate atīte 'dhvani rājābhūtsaṃihasaudāso
nāma/ sa māṃsabhojanāhārātiprasaṅgena pratisevamāno
rasatṛṣṇādhyavasānaparamatayā māṃsāni mānuṣyāṇy api bhakṣitavān/
tannidānaṃ ca mitrāmātyajñātibandhuvargeṣṇāpi parityaktaḥ
prāg eva paurajānapadaiḥ svarājyaviṣyaparityāgāc ca
mahadvyasanamāṃsāditavān māṃsahetoḥ//
indreṇāpi ca mahāmate devādhipatyaṃ prāptena pūrvābhūtvā
pūrvajanmamāṃsād avāsanādoṣāc chyenarūpam āsthāya kaotaveṣarupadhārī
viśvakarmā samabhidruto 'bhūt tulāyāṃ cātmānam
āropita āsīt/ yasmād rājānaparādhībhūtānukampakaḥ
śivī duḥkhena mahatālambhitaḥ/ tad evam anekajanmātyas tam api
mahāmate devendrabhutasya śakrasyāpi sataḥ svaparadoṣāvahanam
abhūt prāg eva tad anyeṣām//
anyeṣāṃ ca mahāmate naredrabhutānāṃ satām aśvenāpahṛtānām
aṭavyāṃ paryaṭamānānāṃ siṃhyā saha maithunaṃ gatavatāṃ jīvitabhayād
apatyāni cotpāditavantaḥ siṃhasaṃvāsānvayāt
kalmāṣapadaprabhṛtayo nṛpaputrā pūrvajanmamāṃsād adoṣavāsanatayā
manuṣyendrabhūtā api santo māṃsādā abhūvan/ ihaiva ca
mahāmate janmani saptakuṭīrake 'pi grāme pracuramāṃsalaulyād
atiprasaṅgena niṣevamānā mānuṣamāṃsādā ghorā ḍākā

māṃsarasādhyavasānatayā siṃhavyāghradvīpivṛkatarakṣumārjāra-
jambukolūkādipracuramāṃsādayoniṣu pracurātarapiśitāśanā
rākṣasādighoratarayoniṣu vinipātyante/ yatra vinipatitānāṃ
duḥkhena mānuṣyayonir api samāpadyate prāg eva
nirvṛtiḥ/ ityevamādayo mahāmate māṃsādadoṣāḥ prāg eva
niṣevamānāṃ samupajāyante viparyayāc ca bhūyāṃso guṇāḥ/
na ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā etāṃś cānyāṃś ca guṇadoṣām

hetubhir vāryate mūḍhaiś cātuṣkoṭikayojitaiḥ//10-490cd//
na hetavo na koṭyo vai dṛṣṭāntāvayavāni ca//10-491ab//
svacittaṃ hy arthasaṃkrāntaṃ yadi jānanti paṇḍitāḥ//10-491cd//
vikalpair vikalpeta yad vikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ//10-492ab//
kalpitaṃ ca samāśritya vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate//10-492cd//
anyonyābhinnasaṃbandhāe ekabāsanahetukāḥ//10-493ab//
āgantukatvāt taddvayor na cittaṃ jāyate nṛṇām//10-493cd//
vikalpaṃ cittacaitārthī tribhave ca pratiṣṭhitāḥ//10-494ab//
yadarthābhās pravartante svabhāvakalpito hi saḥ//10-494cd//
ābhāsabījasaṃyogād dvādaśāyatanāni vai//10-495ab//
āśrayālambyasaṃyogāt prakriyā varṇayate mayā//10-495cd//
yathā hi darpaṇe bimbaṃ keṣoṇḍus timirasya vā//10-496ab//
tathā hi bāsaiś cchannaṃ cittaṃ paśyanti bāliśāḥ//10-496cd//
svavikalpakalpite hy arthe vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate//10-497ab//
artho na vidyate bāhyo yathā tīrthair vikalpyate//10-497cd//
rajjum yathā hy ajānāḥ sarpaṃ gṛhṇanti bāliśāḥ//10-498ab//
svacittamārtham ajānānā hy arthaṃ kalpenti vāhiram//10-498cd//
tathā hi rajjuṃ rajjutve ekatvānyatvavarjitam//10-499ab//
kiṃ tu svacittadoṣo 'yaṃ yena rajjur vikalpyate//10-499cd//

astitvapūrvakaṃ nāsti asti nāstitvapūrvakam//10-501ab//
ato nāsti na gantavyaṃ astitvaṃ na ca kalpayet//10-501cd//
kalpitaṃ kalpyamānaṃ hi yad idaṃ na tadātmakam//10-502ab//
anātmakaṃ kathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate//10-502cd//
rūpaṃ rūpātmanā nāsti tathā ghaṭapaṭādayaḥ//10-503ab//
avidyamāne dṛśye tu vikalpas tena jāyate//10-503cd//
vikalpas te yadi bhrāntāv anādimati saṃskṛte//10-504ab//
bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā kena bhrāmitā brūhi me mune//10-504cd//
bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā nāsti cittamātraṃ ca dṛśyate//10-505ab//
apaśyamāhaṇ svacittaṃ vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate//10-505cd//
kalpitaṃ yadi vai nāsti yathā kalpati bāliśaḥ//10-506ab//
anyathā vidyate cāsau na ca buddhyāvagmate//10-506cd//
āryāṇāṃ yad ivā so 'sti nāsau bālair vikalpitaḥ//10-507ab//
āryāṇām atha mithYāsau āryā bālaiḥ samaṃ gatāḥ//10-507cd//
āryāṇāṃ nāsti vai bhrantir yasmāc cittaṃ viśodhitam//10-508ab//
aśuddhacittasaṃtānā bālāḥ kalpenti kalpitam//10-508cd//
mātā yathā hi putrasya ākāśāt phalam ānayet//10-509ab//
etad dhi putra mākranda gṛhṇa citram idaṃ phalam//10-509cd//
tathāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ vicitraiḥ kalpitaiḥ phalaiḥ//10-510ab//
pralobhya deśemi nayaṃ sadasatpakṣavarjitam//10-510cd//
abhūtvā yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayair na ca saṃkulā//10-511ab//
ajātapūrvaṃ tajjātam alabdhātmakam eva ca//10-511cd//
alabdhātmakaṃ hy ajātaṃ ca pratyayair na vinā kvacit//10-512ab//
utpannam api te bhāvo pratyayair na vinā kvacit//10-512cd//
evaṃ samāsataḥ paśyaṃ nāsan na sadasat kvacit//10-513ab//
pratyayair jāyate bhūtam avikalpyaṃ hi paṇḍitaiḥ//10-513cd//
ekatvānyatvakathāḥ kutīrthyāḥ kurvanti bāliśāḥ//10-514ab//
pratyayair na ca jānanti māyāsvapnopamaṃ jagat//10-514cd//
abhidhānaviṣayaṃ yānaṃ mahāyānam anuttaram//10-515ab//
arthaṃ sunītaṃ hi mayā na ca budhyanti bāliśāḥ//10-515cd//
mātaryair ye praṇītāni śrāvakais tīrthakais tathā//10-516ab//
vyabhicaranti te hy arthaṃ yasmāt tarkeṇa deśitāḥ//10-516cd//
lakṣaṇaṃ bhāvaṃ saṃsthānaṃ nāma caiva caturvidham//10-517ab//
etad ālambanīkṛtya kalpanā saṃpravartate//10-517cd//
ekadhā badhudhā ye tu brahmakāyavaśaṃgatāḥ//10-518ab//
somabhāskarayor bhūtvā ye bālenti na te sutāḥ//10-518cd//
āryadarśanasaṃpannā yathābhūtagatiṃgatāḥ//10-519ab//
saṃjñāvivartakuśalā vijñāne ca paraṃgatāḥ//10-519cd//
eṣā hi mudrā muktānāṃ putrāṇāṃ mama śāsane//10-520ab//
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktā gatyāgativivarjitā//10-520cd//
vyāvṛtte rūpavijñāne yadi karma vinaśyati//10-521ab//
nityānityaṃ na prāpnoti saṃsāraś ca na vidyate//10-521cd//
vinirvṛttikāle pradhvas taṃ rūpaṃ deśān nivartate//10-522ab//
nāstyastidoṣanirmuktaṃ karma tiṣṭhati ālaye//10-522cd//
pradhvaṃsi patitaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānaṃ ca bhavālaye//10-523ab//
rūpavijñānasaṃbaddhaṃ na ca kama vinaśyati//10-523cd//
atha taiḥ saha saṃbaddhaṃ karma vai dhvasyate nṛṇām//10-524ab//
dhvas te tu karmasaṃbandhe na saṃsṛtir na nirvṛtiḥ//10-524cd//
atha dhvastam api taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsāre yadi jāyate//10-525ab//
rūpaṃ ca tena saṃbaddhaṃ abhinnatvād bhaviṣyati//10-525cd//
nābhinnaṃ na ca vai bhinnaṃ cittaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpanāt//10-526ab//
rpadhvaṃso nāsti bhāvānāṃ sadasatpakṣavarjanāt//10-526cd//
kalpitaḥ paratantraś ca anyonyoābhinnalakṣaṇāt//10-527ab//
rūpe hy anityatā yadvad anyonyajanakāś ca vai//10-527cd//
anyo 'nanyavinirmuktaḥ kalpito nāvadhāryate//10-528ab//
nāstyasti kathaṃ bhavati rpe cānityatā yathā//10-528cd//
kalpitena sudṛṣṭena paratantro na jāyate//10-529ab//
parantantreṇe dṛṣṭena kalpitas tathatā bhavet//10-529cd//
kalpitaṃ hi vināśete mama netrī vinaśyate//10-530ab//
samāropāpavādaṃ ca kurvate mama śāsane//10-530cd//
evaṃvidhā yadā dasmin kāLe syur dharmadūṣakāḥ//10-531ab//
sarve ca te hy asaṃkathyā mama netrīvināśakāḥ//10-531cd//
anālapyāc vidvadbhir bhikṣukāryaṃ ca varjayet//10-532ab//
kalpitaṃ yatra nāśenti samāropāpavādinaḥ//10-532cd//
keśoṇḍukamāyābhaṃ svapnagandharvasādṛśam//10-533ab//
marīcyābhadṛśakalpo yeṣāṃ nāstyastidarśanāt//10-533cd//
nāsau śikṣati buddhānāṃ yas teṣāṃ saṃgrahe caret//10-534ab//
dvayāntapatitā hy ete anyeṣāṃ ca vināśakāḥ//10-534cd//
viviktaṃ kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ ye tu paśyanti yoginaḥ//10-535ab//
bhāvābhāvavinirmuktaṃ teṣāṃ vai saṃgrahe caret//10-535cd//
ākarā hi yathā loke suvarṇamaṇi muktijāḥ//10-536ab//
akarmahetukāś citrā japajīvyāś ca bāLiśām//10-536cd//
tathā hi sattvagotrāṇi citrā vai karmavarjitā//10-537ab//
dṛśyābhāvān na karmāstina ca vai karmajā gatiḥ//10-537cd//
bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā nāsti yathā tv āryair vibhāvyate//10-538ab//
kiṃ tu vidyanti vai bhāvā yathā bālair vikalpitāḥ//10-538cd//
yadi bhāvā na vidyante yathā bālair vikalpitāḥ//10-539ab//
asatsu sattvabhāveṣu saṃkleśo nāsti kasyacit//10-539cd//
bhāvavaicitryasaṃkleśāt saṃsāra indriyo gataḥ//10-540ab//
ajñānatṛṣṇāsaṃbaddhaḥ pravartate śarīriṇām//10-540cd//
yeṣāṃ tu bhāvo vai nāsti yathā bālair vikalpitaḥ//10-541ab//
teṣāṃ na vidyate vṛttir indiryāṇāṃ na yoginaḥ//10-541cd//
yadi bhāvā na vidyante bhāvasṃsārahetavaḥ//10-542ab//
ayaṃ tena bhaven mokṣo bālānāṃ kriyavarjitaḥ//10-542cd//
bālāryāṇāṃ viśeṣas te bhāvābhavat kathaṃ bhavet//10-543ab//
āryāṇāṃ nāsti vai bhāvo vimokṣatrayacāriṇām//10-543cd//
skandhāś ca pudgalā dharmāḥ svasāmānyā alakṣaṇāḥ//10-544ab//
pratyayānīndriyāś caiva śrāvakāṇāṃ vadāmy aham//10-544cd//
ahetucittamātraṃ ca vibhūti bhūmayas tathā//10-545ab//
pratyātmatathatāṃ śuddhāṃ deśayāmi jinaurasān//10-545cd//
bhaviṣyanty anāgate kāle mama śāsanadūṣakāḥ//10-546ab//
kāṣāyavāsovasanāḥ sadasatkāryavādinaḥ//10-546cd//
asantaḥ pratyayair bhāvā vidyante hy āryagocaram//10-547ab//
kalpito nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ//10-547cd//
bhaviṣyanty anāgate kāle kaṇabhuṅbālajātikāḥ//10-548ab//
asatkāryavādadrudṛṣṭyā janatāṃ nāśayanti ca//10-548cd//
aṇubhyo jagat utpannam aṇavaś cāpy ahetukāḥ//10-549ab//
navadravyāni nityāni kudṛṣṭyā deśayiṣyati//10-549cd//
dravyair ārabhyate dravyaṃ guṇaiś caiva guṇās tathā//10-550ab//
bhavānāṃ bhāvatām anyāṃ satīṃ vai nāśayiṣyati//10-550cd//
ādimān hi bhavel loko yady abhūtvā parvartate//10-551ab//
pūrvā ca koṭir naivāsti saṃsārasya vadāmy aham//10-551cd//
tribhavaḥ sarvasaṃkhyātaṃ yadi abhūtvā pravartate//10-552ab//
śvānoṣṭrakharaśṛṅgāṇāṃ utpattiḥ syān na saṃśayaḥ//10-552cd//
yadi abhūtvā bhavec cakṣū rūpaṃ vijñānam eva ca//10-553ab//
kaṭamukuṭapaṭādyānāṃ mṛtpiṇḍāt saṃbhavo bhavet//10-553cd//
paṭaiś ca vai kaṭo nāsti paṭo vai vīraṇais tathā//10-554ab//
eka ekatrā saṃbhūtaḥ pratyayaiḥ kiṃ na jāyate//10-554cd//
tajjīvaṃ taccharīraṃ ca yac cābhūtvā pravartate//10-555ab//
paravādā hy amī sarve mayā ca samudāhṛtā//10-555cd//
ucchārya pūrvapakṣaṃ ca matis teṣāṃ nivāryate//10-556ab//

ato 'rthaṃ tīrthavādānāṃ kṛtam uccāraṇaṃ mayā//10-557ab//

pradhānāj jagad utpannaṃ kapilāṃgo 'pi drumatiḥ//10-558ab//
śiṣyebhyaḥ saṃprakāśeti guṇānāṃ ca vikāritā//10-558cd//
na bhūtraṃ nāpi cābhūtaṃ pratyatair na ca pratyayāḥ//10-559ab//
pratyayānām asadbhāvād abhūtraṃ na pravartate//10-559cd//
sadasatpakṣavigato hatupratyayavajitaḥ//10-560ab//
utpādabhaṅgarahitaḥ svapakṣo lakṣyavajitaḥ//10-560cd//
māyāsvapnopamaṃ lokaṃ hetupratyayavarjitam//10-561ab//
ahetukaṃ sadā paśyan vikalpo na pravartate//10-561cd//
gandharvamṛgatṛṣṇābhaṃ keśoṇḍūkanibhaṃ sadā//10-562ab//
sadasatpakṣavigataṃ hetupratyayavarjitam//10-562cd//
ahetukaṃ bhavaṃ paśyaṃś cittadhārā viśudhyate//10-562ef//
vastu na vidyate paśyaṃś cittamātraṃ na vidyate//10-563ab//
avastukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate//10-563cd//
vsatum ālambanīkṛtya cittaṃ saṃjāyate nṛṇām//10-564ab//
ahetukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate//10-564cd//
tathatā cittamātraṃ ca āryavastunayasya tu//10-565ab//
vidyante na ca vidyante na te mannayakovidāḥ//10-565cd//
grāhyagrāhakabhāvena yadi cittaṃ pravartate//10-566ab//
etad dhi laukikaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate//10-566cd//
dehabhogapratiṣṭhābhaṃ svapnavaj jāyate yadi//10-567ab//
dvicittatā prasajyeta na ca cittaṃ dvilakṣaṇam//10-567cd//
svadhāraṃ hi yathā khaṅgaṃ svāgraṃ vai aṅgulir yathā//10-568ab//
na cchindate na spṛśate tathā cittaṃ svadarśane//10-568cd//
na paraṃ na ca vai tantraṃ kalpitaṃ vastum eva ca//10-569ab//
pañca dharmā dvicittaṃ ca nirābhāse na santi vai//10-569cd//
utpādakaṃ ca utpādyaṃ dvividhaṃ bhāvalakṣaṇam//10-570ab//
utpādakaṃ hi sandhāya naiḥsvabhāvavyaṃ vadāmy aham//10-570cd//
atha vaicitryasaṃsthānaṃ kalpā ca yadi jāyate//10-571ab//
ākāśe śaśaśṛṅe ca arthābhāsaṃ bhaviṣyati//10-571cd//
arthābhāsaṃ bhavec cittaṃ tadarthaḥ syād akalpitaḥ//10-572ab//
na ca vai kalpito hy arthaḥ cittād anyo 'bhilabhyate//10-572cd//
anādimati saṃsāre artho vai nāsti kutracit//10-573ab//
apuṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ cittam arthābhāsaṃ pravatate//10-573cd//
yadi abhāvena puṣṭiḥ syāc chaśaśṛṅe 'pu tad bhavet//10-574ab//
na cābhāvena vai puṣṭo vikalpaḥ saṃpravatate//10-574cd//
yathāpi dānīṃ naivāsti tathā pūrve 'pi nāsty asau//10-575ab//
anarthe arthasaṃbaddhaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pravartate//10-575cd//
tathatā śūnyatā koṭir nirvāṇaṃ dharmadhātukam//10-576ab//
anutpādaś ca dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ pāramārthikaḥ//10-576cd//
nāstyastipatitā bālā hetupratyayakalpanaiḥ//10-577ab//
ahetukam anutpannaṃ bhavaṃ vai aprajānatah//10-577cd//
cittaṃ khyāti na dṛśyo 'sti viśeṣo 'nādihetukaḥ//10-578ab//
anādāv api nāsty artho viśeṣaḥ kena jāyate//10-578cd//
yady abhāvena puṣṭiḥ syād daridro dhanavān bhavet//10-579ab//
arthābhāve kathaṃ cittaṃ jāyate brūhi me mune//10-579cd//
ahetukam idaṃ sarvaṃ na cittaṃ na ca gocaraḥ//10-580ab//
na ca vai puṣyate cittam tribhavaṃ kriyavarjitam//10-580cd//
utpādavinivṛttyartham anutpādaprasādhanam//10-581ab//
ahetuvādaṃ deśemi na ca bālair vibhāvyate//10-581cd//
anutpanam idaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca//10-581ef//
gandharvasvapnamāyākhyā bhāvā vidyanty ahetukāḥ//10-582ab//
anutpannān svabhāvāṃś ca śūnyāḥ kena vadāsi me//10-582cd//
samavāyavinirmukto yadā bhāvo na dṛśyate//10-583ab//
tadā śūnyam anutpanam asvabhāvaṃ vadāmy aham//10-583cd//
svapnakeśoṇḍukaṃ māyā gandharvamṛgatṛṣṇikā//10-584ab//
ahetukāpi dṛśyante tathā lokavicitratā//10-584cd//
samavāyas tathaivaiko dṛśyābhāvān na vidyate//10-585ab//
na tu tīrthyadṛṣṭyā pralayo samavāyo na vidyate//10-585cd//
vigṛhyāhetuvādena anutpādaṃ prasādhayet//10-586ab//
anutpādaiḥ prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati//10-586cd//
ahetuvādair deśyante tīrthyānāṃ jāyate bhayam//10-587ab//
kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo 'hetuko bhavet//10-587cd//
nāhetukam ahetutvaṃ yadā paśyanti paṇḍītāḥ//10-588ab//
tadā vyāvartate dṛṣṭir bhaṅgotpādānuvādinī//10-588cd//
kim abhāvo hy anutpāda utpādotpattilakṣaṇam//10-589ab//
atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā brvīhi me//10-589cd//
na ca bhāvo hy anutpādo na ca prayayalakṣaṇam//10-590ab//
na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam//10-590cd//
yatra śrāvakabuddhānāṃ tīrthyānāṃ ca agocaraḥ//10-591ab//
saptabhūmigatānāṃ ca tad anutpādalakṣaṇam//10-591cd//
hetupratyayavyāvṛttiṃ kāraṇasya niṣedhanam//10-592ab//
cittamātravyavasthānam anutpādaṃ vadāmy aham//10-592cd//
ahetuvṛttiṃ bhāvānāṃ kalpyakalpavarjitam//10-593ab//
sadasatpakṣanirmuktam anutpādaṃ vadāmy aham//10-593cd//
cittadṛśyavinirmuktaṃ svabhāvadvayavarjitam//10-594ab//
āśrayasya parāvṛttim anutpādaṃ vadāmy aham//10-594cd//
nabāhyabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ na ca cittaparigrham//10-595ab//
sarvadṛṣṭiprahāṇaṃ yattad anutpādalakṣaṇam//10-595cd//
evaṃ śūnyāsvabhāvādyāt sarvadharmān vibhāvayet//10-596ab//
na jātaśūnayayā śūnyā kiṃtv anutpādaśūnyayā//10-596cd//
kalāpaḥ pratyayānāṃ hi pravartate nivartate//10-597ab//
kalāpāc ca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate//10-597cd//
bhāvo na vidyate hy anyaḥ kalāpāc ca pṛthak kvacit//10-598ab//
ekatvena pṛthaktvena yathā tīrthye vikapyate//10-598cd//
sadasan na jāyate bhāvo nāsan na sadasat kvacit//10-599ab//
anyatra hi kalāpo 'yaṃ pravartate nivartate/10-599cd//
saṃketamātram evedam anyonyāpaekṣasaṃkalāt//10-600ab//
janyam arthaṃ na caivāsti pṛthak pratyayasaṃkalāt//10-600cd//
janyābhāvo hy anutpādaḥ tīrthadoṣavivarjitaḥ//10-601ab//
deśemi saṃkalāmātraṃ na ca bālair vibhāvyate//10-601cd//
yasya janyo hi bhāvo 'sti saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit//10-602ab//
ahtuvādī vijñeyaḥ saṃkalāyā vināśakaḥ//10-602cd//
pradīyadravyajātīnāṃ vyañjakā saṃkalā bhavet//10-603ab//(3-103ab//)
yasya bhāvo bhavet kaścit saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit//10-603cd//(3-103cd//)
asvabhāvo hy anutpannaḥ prakṛtyā gaganopamaḥ//10-604ab//(3-108ab)
saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthagbhūto yo dharmaḥ kalpito 'budhaiḥ//10-604cd//(3-108cd)
ayam anyam anutpādam āryāṇāṃ prāptidharmatā//10-605ab//(3-109ab)
yaś ca tasya anutpādaṃ tad anutpādakṣāntiḥ syāt//10-605cd//(3-109cd)

lavaṇādibhiś ca lāvaṇyaṃ bījavat kiṃ na varatate//10-833cd//
anyatve ca tadanyatve ubhayaṃ nobhaye tathā//10-834ab//
astitvaṃ nirupādānaṃ na ca nāsti na saṃskṛtam//10-834cd//
aśvavad vidyate hy ātmā skandhair gobhāvavarjitam//10-835ab//
saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ vācyam avaktavyaṃ svabhāvakam//10-835cd//
yuktyāgamābhyāṃ durdṛṣṭyā tarkadṛṣṭyā malīkṛtaṃ//10-836ab//
anirdhārya vadanty ātmā nopādāne na cānyataḥ//10-836cd//
doṣanirdhāraṇā hy eṣā skandhenātmā vibhāvyate//10-837ab//
ekatvena tadanyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ//10-837cd//
darpaṇe udake netre yathā bimbaṃ pradṛśyate//10-838ab//
ekatvānyatvarahitas tathā skandheṣu pudgalaḥ//10-838cd//
bhāvyaṃ vibhāvanādhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam//10-839ab//
etad trayaṃ vibhāvento mucyante hi kudarśanaiḥ//10-839cd//
dṛṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ yathā vidyuc cakraṃ cchidragṛhe yathā//10-840ab//
pariṇāṃaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ bālair iva na kalpayet//10-840cd//
bhāvābhāvena nirvāṇaṃ bālānāṃ cittamohanam//10-841ab//
āryadarśanasadbhāvād yathāvasthānadarśanāt//10-841cd//
utpādabhaṅgarahitaṃ bhāvābhāvavivarjitam//10-842ab//
lakṣyalakṣaṇanirmuktaṃ pariṇāṃaṃ vibhāvayet//10-842cd//
tīrthyavādavinirmuktaṃ nāmasṃsthānavajitam//10-843ab//
adhyātmadṛṣṭinilayaṃ pariṇāmaṃ vibhāvayet//10-843cd//
saṃsparśapīḍanābhyāṃ vai devānāṃ nārakāṇi ca//10-844ab//
antarābhavikā nāsti vijñānena pravartate//10-844cd//
jarajāṇḍajasaṃsvedādyā antarābhasaṃbhavāḥ//10-845ab//
sattvakāyā yathā citrā gatyāgtyāṃ vibhāvayet//10-845cd//
yuktyāgamavyapetāni niḥkleśapakṣakṣayāvahā//10-846ab//
tīrthyadṛṣṭipralāpāni matimān na samcaret//10-846cd//
ādau nirdhāryate ātmā upādānād viśeṣayet//10-847ab//
anirdhārya viśeṣanti bandhyāputraṃ viśiṣYate//10-847cd//
paśyāmi sattvān divyena prajñāmāṃsavivarjitam//10-848ab//
saṃskāraskndhanirmuktaṃ mūrtimān sarvadehinām//10-848cd//
durvarṇasuvarṇagataṃ muktāmuktaviśeṣaṇam//10-849ab//
divyaṃ saṃskāravigataṃ saṃskārasthaṃ prapaśyate//10-489cd//
mūrtimān gatisaṃdhau vai tārkikānām agocaram//10-850ab//
atikrāntam ānuṣyagatimahaṃ nānye kutārkikāḥ//10-850cd//
nāsty ātmā jāyate cittaṃ kasmād etat pravartate//10-851ab//
nadīdīpabījavat tasay nirgamaḥ kiṃ na kathyate//10-851cd//
anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñānādi na vidyate//10-852ab//
tadabhāve na vijñānaṃ saṃtatya jāyate katham//10-852cd//
adhvatrayam anadhvaś ca avaktavyaś ca pañcamaḥ//10-853ab//
jñeyam etad dhi buddhānāṃ tārkikaiḥ saṃprakīrtyate//10-853cd//
avaktavyaś ca saṃskārair jñānaṃ saṃskārahetukam//10-854ab//
gṛhṇāti saṃskāragataṃ jñānaṃ saṃskāraśabditam//10-854cd//
asmin satīdaṃ bhavati pratyayāś cāpy ahetukāḥ//10-855ab//
vyañjakenopadiśyante tadabhāvān na kārakam//10-855cd//
pavanaṃ hi vahner dahanaṃ prereṇe na tu saṃbhave//10-856ab//
prerya nirvāyate te na kathaṃ sattvaprasādhakāḥ//10-856cd//
saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ vācyam upadādānavivarjitam//10-857ab//
kathaṃ hi sādhakas tasya vahnir bālair vikalpyate//10-857cd//
anyonyoasya balādhānād vahnir vai jāyate nṛṇām//10-858ab//
sattvaḥ pravartitaḥ kena vahnivat kalpate yataḥ//10-858cd//
skandhāyatanakadambasya manādyākāraṇo nu vai//10-859ab//
nairātmā sārthavan nityaṃ cittena saha vartate//10-859cd//
dvāv etau bhāsvarau nityaṃ kāryakāraṇavarjitau//10-860ab//
agnir dy asādhakas teṣāṃ na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ//10-860cd//
cittaṃ sattvāś ca nirvāṇām prakṛtyā bhāsurā nu vai//10-861ab//
doṣair anādikaiḥ kliṣṭā abhinṇā gaganopamāḥ//10-861cd//
hastiśayyādivac chāsās tīrthadṛṣṭyā malīkṛtāḥ//10-862ab//
manovijñānasaṃcchannā agnir ādyair viśodhitāḥ//10-862cd//
dṛṣṭāś ca te yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭā kleśā vidāritāḥ//10-863ab//
dṛṣṭāntagahanaṃ hitvā gatās te āryagocaram//10-863cd//
jñānajñeyavibhāvgena anyatraṃ kalpyate yataḥ//10-864ab//
na ca budhyanti durmedhā avaktavyaś ca kathyate//10-864cd//
bherī yathā candanajā bālaiḥ kurvanti nānyathā//10-865ab//
candanāgurusamKāśaṃ tathā jñānaṃ kutārkikaiḥ//10-865cd//
utthitaḥ khalu bhaktaś ca pātrasaṃśritamātrakam//10-866ab//
doṣair mukhavikārādhaiḥ śuddhaṃ bhaktaṃ samācaret//10-866cd//
imaṃ nayaṃ yo 'numinoti yuktitaḥ prasādavānyogaparo hy akalpanaḥ//10-867ab//
anāśrito hy arthaparo bhayed asau hiraṇyayīṃ dharamgatiṃ pradīpayet//10-867cd//
bhāvābhāvapratyayamohakalpanā kudṛṣṭijālaṃ samalaṃ hi tasya tu//10-868ab//
sarāgadoṣapratighaṃ nivartate nirañjano buddhakaraiś ca sicyate//10-868cd//
tīrthyā kāraṇadig mūḍhā anye pratyayabihvalāḥ//10-869ab//
anye ahetusaddhāvād ucchedam aryam āsthitāḥ//10-869cd//
vipākapariṇāmaś ca vijñānasya manasya ca //10-870ab//
mano hy ālayasaṃbhūtaṃ vijñānaṃ ca manobhavam//10-870cd//
ālayāt sarvacittāni pravartanti taraṅgavat//10-871ab//
vāsanāhetukāḥ sarve yathāpratyayasaṃbhavāḥ//10-871cd//
kṣaṇabhedasaṃkalābaddhāḥ svacittārthavigrahīṇaḥ//10-872ab//
saṃsthānalakṣaṇākārā manocakṣvādisaṃbhavāḥ//10-872cd//
anādidoṣasaṃbaddham arthābhāvāsanoditam//10-873ab//
bahirdhā dṛśyate cittam tīrthadṛṣṭinivāraṇam//10-873cd//
tadhetukam evānyat adālambya pravartate//10-874ab//
yadā saṃjāyate dṛṣṭiḥ saṃsāraś ca pravartate//10-874cd//
mayāsvapnanibhā bhāvā gandharvanagaropamāḥ//10-875ab//
marīcyudakacandrābhāḥ svavikalpaṃ vibhāvayet//10-875cd//
vṛttibhedāt tu tathatā samyagjñānaṃ tadāśrayam//10-876ab//
māyāśūraṃgamādīni samādhīni parāṇi ca//10-876cd//
bhūmipraveśāl labhate abhijñā vaśitāni ca//10-877ab//
jñānamāyopamaṃ kāyam abhiṣiktaṃ ca saugatam//10-877cd//
nivartate yadā cittaṃ nivṛttaṃ paśyato jagat/10-878ab//
muditāṃ labhate bhūmiṃ buddhabhūmiṃ labhanti ca//10-878cd//
āśrayeṇa nivṛttena viśvarūpo maṇir yathā//10-879ab//
karoti sattvakṛytāni pratibimbaṃ yathā jale//10-879cd//
sadasatpakṣanirmuktam ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ na ca//10-880ab//
pratyekaśrāvakīyābhyāṃ niṣkraantā saptamī bhavet//10-880cd//
pratyātmadṛṣṭadharmāṇāṃ bhūtabhūmiviśodhitam//10-881ab//
bāhyatīrthavinirmuktaṃ mahāyānaṃ vinirviśet//10-881cd//
parāvṛttir vikalpasya cyutināśavivarjitam//10-882ab//
śaśaromamaṇiprakhyaṃ muktānāṃ deśayen nayam//10-882cd//
yathā hi grantho granthena yuktyā yuktis tathā yati//10-883ab//
ato yuktir bhavet yuktim anyathā tu na kalpayet//10-883cd//
cakṣuḥ karma ca tṛṣṭṇā ca avidyā yoginas tathā//10-884ab//
cakṣurūpe manaś cāpi āvilasya manas tathā//10-884cd//
